description: NOTICE EDITOR'S NOTE The following acquisition notice has been updated to correct the delivery information. Acccounts ( Ndosh Application Remark Assistance) have been closed due to incorrect delivery information. Note is updated to reflect correct deliver locations. NEW CONNECTION ATTACHMENTSED IT>
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer: Delivery of Aviation Fuel for Government Agencies

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference:** WS3824587166
* **Publication Date:** January 23, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Period:** May 1, 2022, to May 31, 2024

## Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a standing offer for the delivery of aviation fuel (into-plane) to various government agencies across Canada. The fuel must meet Canadian General Standards Board standards.

## Delivery Locations

* Ontario (except NCR)
* Manitoba
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* British Columbia
* Quebec (except NCR)
* Saskatchewan
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Yukon
* Nova Scotia
* Prince Edward Island
* New Brunswick
* Alberta
* Northwest Territories

## Eligibility

Bidders must be able to provide supporting documentation and submit their bids on time to be considered.

## Selection Criteria

The bid with the lowest price will be selected.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders who have agreements with the following countries:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Bobbi MacLeod
* [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can also visit the following website to view the full tender documentation:

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15205495?extsite=MTUyMDU0OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

However, please note that the closing time has been amended to 2:00 PM EST on February 6, 2023.

---

Final Output
There is one correction needed to be done.  The revised term for product offer/g
